ygData.subject: An interesting note
ygData.msgSnippet: This qualifies as more rumor, but so what?  From the news at eqhaven.com - note the last sentence! _______ WEDNESDAY, OCTOBER 13, 1999 FUN IN TEMPLE OF SOL RO
ygData.messageBody:
This qualifies as more rumor, but so what? From the news at eqhaven.com -
note the last sentence!

_______
WEDNESDAY, OCTOBER 13, 1999
FUN IN TEMPLE OF SOL RO 2:41PM PST Palamides

Well, not much to report, but I was exploring the Temple of Solusek Ro, and
I clicked on bookcase type thing, and there was a passage behind a fake
wall... I went down, and there was an Efreeti by a huge stream of Lava
coming from the ceiling. When I hailed this guy, I lost faction with
"Faction 415" which is apparently Solusek Ro temple people. I am now indif
compared to my old "amiable". A Guide who was around at the time noticed
this, and as a joke, hailed the efreeti about 15 times. This resulted in the
whole room attacking the guide, and the guide had to suicide the whole room
of NPCs. Interesting tidbit I thought. He also promised me a dynamic quest
for gnomes coming up.
_______

We can only hope.

Morty
Gnome Necromancer on E'ci
